descriptionHtml:
Star Wars Blasters is a work in progress mod WIP WIP WIP!!!!

this mod has plentiful issues like incorrect sounds, model sizes, and incorrect names when I am done finishing the textures esp file and adding ammo I will release it

REQUIRES DAWNGUARD!

currently NO TEXTURES
craftable at smelter in misc/normal sections, requires ironingots to make
the ammo has not been added because I dont know how to make transparent/glowing items yet
the ammo are blasterammo and blasterammogrenade

please let me know if there any problems!
author: xillus
